about_the_game:
Everyone’s a winner with this calorie-tastic Cosmetic Pack celebrating one of Santo Ileso’s finest eateries. They say you are what you eat, so your Boss should feel right at home kitted out head-to-toe like the mascot of Ned’s Diner!

This pack includes the following cosmetic items for customizing your Boss and Saints HQ:

• Chicken Emotes
• Chicken Ned Helmet
• Chicken Ned Suit
• Fancy Egg HQ Collectible
• Chicken Egg Butt Light HQ Collectible

content_descriptors.notes: Saints Row contatins frequent violence with blood effects and portrays the rise of a criminal gang in a realistic modern day America. Frequent cursing, crude humor and sexual innuendos are present throughout the dialogue. The character editor allows the player to be naked including censored genitalia and uncovered breasts.
